= The Electric Field =

== TL;DR ==

* *Definition of electric field*: $E = \frac{F}{q}$
* *Electric field of point charge*: $E = k_e\frac{q'}{r^2}$
* *Electric field of large, uniform charged flat sheet*: $E = \frac{\sigma}{2\epsilon_0}$
* *Electric field of charged line*: $E = \frac{1}{2}k_e\frac{\lambda}{r}$
